summary:
Find a new lorefriendly location for you to claim.
This is a series of new mods which will expand the game with new locations for the player.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/iplwhiterunou31npd2aqsk.png[/img]

[font=Century]
[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u]
-) Skyrim
-) The latest patch


[b][size=+2][color=#ffff66]Description[/color][/size][/b]
-----------------------

I would like to introduce you to one of my next projects which I will expand step by step and add more Locations from time to time.
It's called [color=#cc9900][b]I[/b][/color]mmersive [color=#cc9900][b]P[/b][/color]layer [color=#cc9900][b]L[/b][/color]ocations.
This series contains some little lore friendly additions to the game. I will convert them maybe once to one big file.

Let's start with the first little location of the mod series. This one adds a small little outpost outside of Whiterun. You can discover it on the map and claim it as your own.
Maybe you find also the previous owner. Don't expect something fancy or big. It's just a small nice, cozy and functional home.
The house is nice and little. So don't expect a smithy or something like that. The previous inhabitant was a old mage.

[color=#cc9900][b]Location:[/b][/color]
You can find the house just outside of Whiterun. If you can't find it look on the locations screenshot which is also included in the download.


[b][size=+2][color=#ffff66]Features[/color][/size][/b]
-----------------------

-) Beautiful view up to Whiterun
-) Nice location in the Tundra
-) A small garden behind the house
-) A cooking station
-) Some storage facilities
-) 2 Mannequins
-) 1 Weapon rack and 2 Weapon plaques
-) Alchemy table and Enchanting table
-) 2 Bookshelfs
-) A bed and some fine lightning

Yes a small list compared to my usual mods. But this is only a small immersive location which is part of a whole series.


[b][size=+2][color=#ffff66]Installation[/color][/size][/b]
-----------------------

I would recommend to install the mod with the NMM or any other mod managing tool.

If you want to install it manually drop the following 2 files in your data folder:
-) Whiterun Outpost.esp
-) Whiterun Outpost.bsa


[b][size=+2][color=#ffff66]Uninstallation[/color][/size][/b]
-----------------------

Again I would recommend to uninstall the mod with the NMM or any other mod managing tool.

If you want to uninstall it manually remove the following 2 files in from data folder:
-) Whiterun Outpost.esp
-) Whiterun Outpost.bsa

[i]!Also take out your items before you remove the .esp!
It's save to uninstall, as there are no scripts.[/i]


[b][size=+2][color=#ffff66]Updates[/color][/size][/b]
-----------------------

Reserved for future updates.


[b][size=+2][color=#ffff66]Credits[/color][/size][/b]
-----------------------

Blary for the genious resources I used
Oaristys & Tony67 for their awsome Modders Resource Pack
Bethesda for creating the game and the CK



[size=+2][b]Finally don't forget to enjoy the mod and the game !!![/b][/size]


[color=##cc9900][b][u]My other mods:[/u][/b][/color]

You can find all my mods on my modpage:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3507075/?]Nahkin's mods[/url]

Especially I would like to point you to my first questmod.
Please check it out and endorse if you like it!!
[size=+2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49457/?]The Library[/url][/size]
[/font]
author: Nahkin
